author: TrustyJAID
description: Get a plethora of information about elements on the periodic table.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
install_msg: Do `[p]element <name|number|symbol>` to see info about the element. do `[p]ptable` to get a menu of all elements on the periodic table. NOTE: The mendeleev package is not currently installable on windows.
name: Elements
